mapper.sql: a.ID as ID, a.NAME as NAME, a.ADDRESS as ADDRESS, a.PROVINCE as PROVINCE, a.CITY as CITY, a.AREA as AREA, a.STREET_ID as STREET_ID, a.LOGIN_ID as LOGIN_ID, a.DATE_TIME as DATE_TIME
mapper.select:
select
from LOCATION_POINT a inner join (select count(a.ID) as NUM, a.ID from LOCATION_POINT a where a.NAME like '%加油站%' group by a.ID order by count(a.ID) desc limit 1) b on a.ID = b.ID union all select
from LOCATION_POINT a inner join (select count(a.ID) as NUM, a.ID from LOCATION_POINT a where a.NAME like '%4S店%' group by a.ID order by count(a.ID) desc limit 1) b on a.ID = b.ID
mapper.insert:
insert into LOCATION_POINT (NAME, ADDRESS, PROVINCE, CITY, AREA, STREET_ID, LOGIN_ID, DATE_TIME) values
(#{lp.name}, #{lp.address}, #{lp.province}, #{lp.city}, #{lp.area}, #{lp.streetId}, #{lp.loginId}, #{lp.dateTime})
